EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Boston_OpenHouse_Q116.Invite1 - Open House AND Workshops
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invitation: Pivotal Boston Workshop & Open House
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/transformation-workshop-and-open-house/boston?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=boston-open-house]]> Please join us for a day of innovation and education, Cambridge Open House Event Wednesday March 16, 2016 Talks/Workshops 8:30-4:30 Open house reception 6-9 We look forward to having you joining us.
Kindly RSVP as space is limited for this special event.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
